project_description: This project is a modern web application built with a robust and popular set of frontend technologies. It appears to be a storefront application, given the 'Dashboard' route labeled 'Storefront'.

frontend_framework.name: React
frontend_framework.description: A declarative, component-based JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

language.name: TypeScript
language.description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, enhancing code quality and maintainability.

build_tool.name: Vite
build_tool.description: A fast and opinionated build tool that provides a lightning-fast development experience.

styling.name: Tailwind CSS
styling.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs.

styling.name: PostCSS
styling.description: A tool for transforming CSS with JavaScript plugins.

styling.name: Shadcn UI
styling.description: A collection of re-usable components that are accessible and customizable, integrated via numerous @radix-ui packages.

routing.name: React Router DOM
routing.description: A standard library for routing in React applications, enabling navigation between different views.

form_management.name: React Hook Form
form_management.description: A performant, flexible, and extensible forms library for React.

form_management.name: Zod
form_management.description: A TypeScript-first schema declaration and validation library.

state_management_data_fetching.name: React Query
state_management_data_fetching.description: A powerful library for managing, caching, and synchronizing server state in React applications.

ui_components.name: Radix UI
ui_components.description: A low-level UI component library for building accessible design systems and web applications.

linting.name: ESLint
linting.description: A pluggable linting utility for JavaScript and JSX, ensuring code quality and consistency.
